FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsWorld

FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsWorld Class Reference

The controller for moving objects - this takes data (eg. velocity, force) from Bodies and moves them (the bodies do no movement themselves.). More...

 Used internally by RunSimulation to check for collisions on moving objects.

Detailed Description

The controller for moving objects - this takes data (eg. velocity, force) from Bodies and moves them (the bodies do no movement themselves.).

See also:
FusionPhysicsWorld | FusionPhysicsElipse.

void FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsWorld::LevelChange (  int  level_x,
int  level_y
) 
 

Resets the CollisonGrid and sets the borders up, etc.

Call this every time a new level is loaded.

Remarks:
Remember to add a terrain body for the new level! (use AddBody())
